content: 2 election day socks sock instructions cuff with mc co 56 64 72 stitches join in round without twisting stitches place sm to mark bor *k 1 p 1* repeat from * to end of round repeat for 10 more rounds or until cuff is desired length leg using mc increase stitch count for colorwork size s k 14 m1l repeat to end of round 4 stitches increased 60 stitches total size m k 8 m1l repeat to end of round 8 stitches increased 72 stitches total size l k 4 m1l repeat to end of round 18 stitches increased 90 stitches total begin colorwork chart note that sizes s and l use the chart on page 4 and size m uses the chart on page 5 chart repeats 2 2 3 times per round after finishing chart continue in mc and decrease to original stitch count size s k 13 k2tog repeat to end of round 4 stitches decreased 56 stitches total size m k 7 k2tog repeat to end of round 8 stitches decreased 64 stitches total size l k 3 k2tog repeat to end of round 18 stitches decreased 72 stitches total continue knitting in mc until leg is desired height forethought heel placement use a contrasting waste yarn to k 28 32 36 stitches slip those 28 32 36 stitches from the right needle back to the left needle using the mc knit the waste yarn stitches again cont to end of round foot continue knitting in mc until foot is approximately 1 5 from desired length toe divide stitches equally so that there are 28 32 36 on each of two needles switch to cc if desired round 1 k1 ssk k to 3 stitches before sm k2tog k1 repeat on needle 2 sl sm repeat on other needle round 2 k all stitches repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 20 stitches remain on each needle then repeat round 2 until 10 stitches remain on each needle use kitchener stitch or 3-needle bind off to close toe afterthought heel click here for a helpful video using dpns and cc yarn if desired pick up 28 32 36 stitches above and below waste yarn using the right loops plus 1 extra stitch on each side 30 66 74 stitches total ensure that all stitches are secured before removing waste yarn so that no stitches are dropped cut waste yarn in the middle then unpick the waste yarn pick up two stitches in each corner to close gaps round 1 k all stitches round 2 ssk k to 3 stitches before end of needle k2tog k 1 repeat on other side repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 10 stitches remain on each needle use 3 needle bind off to close heel almost done knit second sock weave in ends block and wear while going to vote © pattern and design copyright stephanie mazur lost socks knits 2024 for personal use only 3 election day socks color work
